title: Easy Chunky Tomato Salsa
ingredients: ['1 glove of garlic, very finely chopped', '1 medium onion, very finely chopped', '3 large tomatoes, very finely chopped', '1 lime, juiced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '3 pinches of salt and pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cumin']
